option.name: VM_PARAMETERS
option.value: --module-path "..\Auction Information System\lib\javafx-sdk-17.0.0.1\lib" --add-modules javafx.controls,javafx.fxml --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.lang.reflect=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.text=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.desktop/java.awt.font=ALL-UNNAMED
